00025 #define IVector_h

00028 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 class IVector
00034 {
00035 
00036 protected:
00038     int_T D;
00040     int_T *T;
00042     bool Shared;
00043 
00044 public:
00045 
00046     // Constructors and affiliated methods ----------------------------------
00047 
00051     inline IVector(int_T dim);
00052 
00057     inline IVector(int_T dim,int_T *t);
00058 
00061     inline IVector(const IVector &V);
00062 
00065     inline IVector(void);
00066     
00071     inline void SetIVector(int_T dim);
00072     
00073     // Destructor and affiliated methods ------------------------------------
00074 
00077     inline ~IVector(void);
00078 
00080     inline void Empty(void);
00081 
00082     // Sharing methods ------------------------------------------------------
00083 
00086     inline void ShareArray(IVector & V);
00087 
00088     // Operator = and initialization methods -------------------------------
00089 
00093     inline void operator=(const IVector &V);
00094

00098     
00099     // IVector-Integer operation ------------------------------------------------
00100     
00103     inline IVector operator-(int_T x);
00104

00108 
00109     // Read/write methods -------------------------------------------------------
00110 
00112     inline int_T & operator[](int_T i);
00113

00143 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00144 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00145 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00146 inline IVector::IVector(int_T dim)
00147 {
00148     D=dim;
00149     T=new int_T[D];
00150     Shared=false;
00151 }
00152 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00153 inline IVector::IVector(int_T dim,int_T *t)
00154 {
00155     D=dim;
00156     T=t;
00157     Shared=true;
00158 }
00159 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00160 inline IVector::IVector(const IVector &V)
00161 {
00162     D=V.D;
00163     T=new int_T[D];
00164 
00165     memcpy((void*)T,(void*)V.T, D*sizeof(int_T) );
00166 
00167     Shared=false;
00168 }
00169 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00170 inline IVector::IVector(void)
00171 {
00172     D=0;
00173     T=NULL;
00174     Shared=false;
00175 }
00176 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00177 inline IVector::~IVector(void)
00178 {
00179     Empty();
00180 }
00181 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00182 inline void IVector::Empty(void)
00183 {
00184     if (D!=0)
00185     {
00186         if (!Shared)
00187             delete [] T;
00188         T=NULL;
00189         D=0;
00190         Shared=false;
00191     }
00192 }
00193 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00194 inline void IVector::ShareArray(IVector & V)
00195 {
00196     Empty();
00197     Shared=true;
00198     D=V.D;
00199     T=V.T;
00200 }
00201 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00202 inline void IVector::Init(int_T x)
00203 {
00204     int_T i=D;
00205     int_T* P=T;
00206     for (;i--;P++)
00207         *P=x;
00208 }
00209 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00210 inline void IVector::SetIVector(int_T dim)
00211 {
00212     Empty();
00213     D=dim;
00214     T=new int_T[D];
00215 }
00216 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00217 inline void IVector::operator=(const IVector &V)
00218 {
00219     if (D==V.D)
00220         memcpy((void*)T,(void*)V.T, D*sizeof(int_T) );
00221     else
00222     {
00223         if (!Shared)
00224         {
00225             Empty();
00226             D=V.D;
00227             T=new int_T[D];
00228             memcpy((void*)T,(void*)V.T, D*sizeof(int_T) );
00229 
00230         }
00231         else
00232         {
00233             sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: Unable to affect a %i IVector to a shared %i IVector.\n",V.D,D);
00234             mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00235         }
00236 
00237      }
00238 }
00239 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00240 inline bool IVector::operator==(const IVector &V) // improvable
00241 {
00242     int_T i=0;
00243     bool res;
00244     if (V.D==D)
00245     {
00246         while ((i<D)&&(T[i]==V.T[i])) i++;
00247         res=(i==D);
00248     }
00249     else
00250         res=false;
00251     return(res);
00252 }
00253 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00254 inline bool IVector::Include(int_T x) // improvable
00255 {   
00256     int_T i=0;
00257     bool res;
00258     
00259     while ((i<D)&&(T[i]!=x)) 
00260         i++;
00261     res=(i<D);
00262     return res;
00263 }
00264 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00265 inline int_T & IVector::operator[](int_T i)
00266 {
00267     if ((i<0)||(i>=D))
00268     {
00269         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: IVector Index overflow ! %i inferior to 0 or superior to %i.\n",i,D-1);
00270         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00271     }
00272 
00273     return T[i];
00274 }
00275 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00276 int_T IVector::Size(void)
00277 {
00278     return D;
00279 }
00280 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00281 int_T IVector::Length(void)
00282 {
00283     return D;
00284 }
00285 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00286 inline void IVector::Printf(char * Format)
00287 {
00288     printf("[");
00289     for (int_T i=0;i<D;i++)
00290     {
00291         printf(Format,T[i]);
00292     }
00293     printf("]\n");
00294 }
